topic.title: Free namecoins here
topic.body: Hi! I registered my first .bit domain http://127.0.0.1:43110/picrandom.bit/ and have spare namecoins. I want to register domain for you for free, or send you enough coins for you to register or update your existing domain name. Just post the desired domain name and zite address, or your namecoin wallet address. In return I kindly ask you to help me distribute all files of my blog if you like it. Thanks.

1_1FLQiXhoa56vb91aiVxyAiC8L5YJy4W3Hi.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_39_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Would I be ableto choose a custom .bit URL then? I don't know how Namecoin works.

Yes, you will can use http://127.0.0.1:43110/yourname.bit instead something like http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LOLV2tVMSn7wByUvmFQqaSMoPMy87Tdw4 for your own zite. Check available domains here https://dotbit.me/. After domain registration completed you simply have to add to content.json of your zite:
{
...
"domain": "yourname.bit",
...
}
But I will warn you, that .bit domains registered for no more than 6 month, after this you need to update it, but it is very cheap.

1522450733_195Xafx3aZsxtngKo7D3XWgByQ5rY.body:
Better to get a VPS and setup VPN yourself, where you can set up no logging option, also it is cheaper and you can do other things on VPS (for example, run your site, or mail server, or zeronet, they consume very little resources and even the cheapest server can handle it, really).
https://github.com/Nyr/openvpn-install is the script which allow you to setup VPN on a server in one minute, it really works great.

1522978931_1GgNo3CmxPd7n2pMSF3uyqf1XHvgt.body:
> [scrubthesecond](#comment_88_1GgNo3CmxPd7n2pMSF3uyqf1XHvgtTUqCe): Not Found&wrapper_nonce=097v376f86b792faf5b2f6e7e96ca994510315c5c758b502637b48cf1fcb31d2

It's better to create an issue on github.

> [nofish](#comment_1153_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): I'm unable to reproduce it in Chrome and Firefox. What browser/os are you using?

1. Open http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/
2. Click on some topic name
3. Click back button in a browser, you will be on the ZeroTalk main page now and in the address bar will appear "?wrapper_nonce=097v376f86b792faf5b2f6e7e96ca994510315c5c758b502637b48cf1fcb31d2"
4. Open any topic again
...
5. Not Found error.

P. S. Firefox 59.0.1

1526269756_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body: Why do you need a blockchain?
